snippet: Kofi Annan is trying to widen the circle of support for his peace plan for Syria. Alleged minutes from his last meeting with Bashar al-Assad suggest he still has work to do in Damascus.
abstract: Kofi Annan is trying to widen the circle of support for his peace plan for Syria. Alleged minutes from his last meeting with Bashar al-Assad suggest he still has work to do in Damascus.

headline.main: Purported Minutes Show Assad Skeptical of Annan Peace Plan
